titlestmt.titleproper: Henry S. Bannister Collection Relating to Joel Munsell
titlestmt.subtitle: A description of his papers at Syracuse University
titlestmt.author: MRC

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: Henry S. Bannister Collection Relating to Joel Munsell
did.abstract: American amateur bibliographer. Collection consists of research files relating to Albany printer Joel Munsell.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: Joel Munsell (1808-1880) was an American printer and antiquarian, and the founder of the Albany, New York, firm which bore his name. He was particularly interested in the history and application of the art of printing; his extensive collection of works on that subject was in part purchased by the New York State Library.
Henry S. Bannister, an alumnus of Syracuse University, was an American amateur bibliographer, particularly interested in early New York State imprints.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The Henry S. Bannister Collection Relating to Joel Munsell consists of research files relating to Albany printer Joel Munsell.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and remains in original order.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: See also the Joel Munsell Collection.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p: The collection originally included a large number of items printed by Munsell, and a few by other New York printers. These were transferred to Rare Books for cataloging; please refer to &summitref; to locate these items (search on "Gift of Henry S. Bannister").

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is currently unprocessed and not available for research. Please contact &scrc_name; for more information.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Henry S. Bannister Collection Relating to Joel Munsell,
&su_name;

note.p: An inventory has not yet been created for this collection. Please contact the Repository listed above for more information.
